conversation.bot: Why did you have a terrible day?

conversation.user: Today the school principal suspended me...
conversation.bot: Before you described day as terrible. Can you go more deep about that?

conversation.user: My parent grounded me for an entire month!
conversation.bot: When your parent grounded you for an entire month, how do you feel?

conversation.user: Well, what do you think about it?
conversation.bot: Please consider whether you can answer your own question.
